title: Location of image formed by lens

content.prompt: The figure above shows a lens with a focal length of magnitude 30 cm when in air. An object is located 200 cm to the left of the lens. What is the approximate location of the objectâ€™s image?

choices.label: 26 cm to the left of the lens
26 cm to the right of the lens
35 cm to the left of the lens
35 cm to the right of the lens

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
